### **🔥 Content, Timing & Format for Posts (Today & Monday)**  

Here’s a **structured breakdown** of what gets posted, when, and in what format:  

---

## **🔹 Today (Thursday) – Engagement on Keith’s Post**
### **1️⃣ Post an Update Before Keith’s Post (New LinkedIn Post)**
**📌 Purpose:** Ensure visibility & pin it in the comments of Keith’s post.  
**📅 Timing:** **ASAP** (before Keith’s post goes live).  
**📑 Content:**  
- Brief **summary of the AI job automation experiment so far.**  
- Thank the community for engagement & **tease what’s coming Monday.**  
- **Call-to-action:** Encourage engagement & discussion.  

**📝 Format:** **New LinkedIn post.**  
✅ This gets **pinned as the first comment** when Keith’s post goes live.  

---

### **2️⃣ Engage on Keith’s Post (Comment & Reshare)**
**📌 Purpose:** Maximize visibility & drive engagement back to your experiment.  
**📅 Timing:** **As soon as Keith’s post is live (within 5 minutes).**  
**📑 Content:**  
- **First comment:** Thank Keith, tie into AI’s impact on hiring, and invite discussion.  
- **Follow-up replies:** Engage with key commenters (hiring managers, execs).  
- **Reshare Keith’s post (1-2 hours later):** Add **your personal insight** on how AI is transforming job applications.  

**📝 Format:**  
✅ **Comment on Keith’s post (within 5 min of it going live).**  
✅ **Reshare Keith’s post with additional insight (1-2 hours later).**  

---

## **🔹 Monday – AI Job Automation Reveal**
### **3️⃣ Post the AI Job Experiment Results (New LinkedIn Post)**
**📌 Purpose:** Showcase the AI-powered job application & start a hiring industry discussion.  
**📅 Timing:** **Monday morning (8-10 AM ET, peak engagement).**  
**📑 Content:**  
- **Hook:** “I applied for a job that I plan to eliminate with AI—here’s what happened.”  
- **Breakdown:**  
  - What job was applied for & why AI can automate it.  
  - How AI-enhanced the application process.  
  - Initial recruiter/hiring manager reactions.  
  - **Call-to-action:** Invite hiring managers to submit job descriptions for AI analysis.  

**📝 Format:** **New LinkedIn Post.**  
✅ This is the **big reveal of the AI job application experiment.**  

---

## **🔥 Final Posting Plan Summary**
| **Date** | **Post Type** | **Timing** | **Format** |
|----------|--------------|------------|------------|
| **Thursday (Before Keith’s Post)** | AI Job Automation Update | **ASAP** | **New LinkedIn Post** |
| **Thursday (When Keith’s Post Drops)** | Engage & Comment | **Within 5 min** | **Comment on Keith’s Post** |
| **Thursday (1-2 Hours After Keith’s Post)** | Reshare w/ Insight | **1-2 hours later** | **New LinkedIn Post** |
| **Monday (Morning)** | AI Job Application Reveal | **8-10 AM ET** | **New LinkedIn Post** |

---

### **🔥 Next Steps**
✅ **Post the update ASAP so it can be pinned in Keith’s post.**  
✅ **Monitor for Keith’s post & engage immediately.**  
✅ **Prepare Monday’s post over the weekend for maximum impact.**  

🔥 **Let’s execute today & build momentum for Monday! 🚀**
